body.p: When the financial statements of a subsidiary used in the preparation of consolidated financial statements are as of a date or for a period that is different from that of the consolidated financial statements (see paragraphs B92 and B93 of IFRS 10), an entity shall disclose:

li.p: the date of the end of the reporting period of the financial statements of that subsidiary; and
the reason for using a different date or period.
